events.message: The customer reported a car accident involving their vehicle on May 10th, requesting to start the insurance claim process immediately.
The claim has been officially categorized under Auto Accident after review of the initial report and photos submitted by the customer.
An agent was promptly assigned to handle the auto accident claim, enabling timely communication and next steps.
Acknowledgement sent to the customer confirming receipt of the claim and outlining the investigation timeline.
Requested detailed police report, vehicle repair estimate, and photos from the customer to proceed with claim assessment.
Customer submitted all requested documentation including police report, photos, and repair estimates for review.
The investigation team began evaluating the circumstances of the vehicle collision and verifying policy coverage.
The investigation concluded successfully with all facts confirmed, supporting liability in favor of the claimant.
A settlement offer has been prepared and communicated to the customer covering repair costs per the policy limits.
Customer responded positively to the settlement offer, expressing gratitude for the swift and transparent process.
The claim was formally approved following customer acceptance of the settlement terms and required documentation.
Insurance payment was successfully issued to the customerâ€™s bank account to cover vehicle repair expenses.
The claim was closed after all payments were processed and no further action is required from the customer.
The entire claim file was archived in compliance with company policies for record-keeping and future reference.
